title: News24.com | Cyril Ramaphosa | A lesson from Wuhan repatriates: lockdown works
description: It is now abundantly clear that the most effective way for a society to contain the spread of the disease is for the population to remain at home and physically isolated from each other for at least several weeks, writes President Cyril Ramaphosa.
content:
2020-03-30 08:24
